title: SECLI - Check that blockage messages have been consummed by ACB
time_sequence: CN - SENDING OF CLIENTS TO ATLAS - PROD LIKE ENV.

task_list.instruction_title: Check that blockage messages have been consummed by ACB
Send Total number of blocage by Company (by company and by blocking type) to IT CUTOVER

Send Total number of blocage by Company and By Tier (by company and by blocking type) to IT CUTOVER :




_select c.NO_SOCI, count(distinct c.NO_CLIENT), count(1)_

_from dbsecli..CLIENT c_

_join dbsecli..F_PREVIOUS_NUMBER p on c.NO_SOCI = p.NO_SOCI and c.NO_CLIENT = p.NO_CLIENT and origin_Bank = 'SGKH'_

_join dbsecli..CONDITIONS co on co.NO_SOCI = c.NO_SOCI and co.NO_CLIENT = c.NO_CLIENT_

_join dbsecli..TCONDITION tc on tc.NO_CONDITION = co.NO_CONDITION and tc.CO_CONDITION <> 'COC'_

_where c.ETAT = 'NULL' group by c.NO_SOCI_




**_Note : this figure is used in order to compare blocage KPIs with Atlas_**
